solution_line_template: He had to pay for {total_car_washes}*{discount_percentage_decimal}=<<{total_car_washes}*{discount_percentage_decimal}={effective_car_washes}>>{effective_car_washes} car washes
That means he had to pay {effective_car_washes}*{cost_per_carwash}=$<<{effective_car_washes}*{cost_per_carwash}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
